presentation.title: Welcome to my portfolio
presentation.subtitle: I am Marion Robert and I am a Full-stack Web Developer.

paragraphs.1: With a background in law, I spent three rewarding years supporting asylum seekers in the community sector. Driven by a desire for new things and daily challenges, I retrained in IT.
paragraphs.2: I discovered programming by learning the Python language, then I followed two training courses in web development with Le Wagon and the 3w Academy.
paragraphs.3: Over the last two years, my various apprenticeships, projects and experiences have allowed me to put my knowledge into practice and strengthen my interest in IT.

harmony.title: Harmony
harmony.description: Harmony helps beneficiaries of international protection to integrate by promoting interactions between neighbors. The application allows you to propose or book activities to exchange services, and each help provided allows you to accumulate points to receive help in return.
harmony.features: User sessions;Activity filtering; Content moderation by an administrator; User notification by email

verdure.title: Verdure
verdure.description: Verdure is a web application for selling indoor plants.
verdure.features: User sessions; Shopping cart; Payment with Stripe; Administrator and user dashboard for tracking and updating order status

synopsix.title: Synopsix
synopsix.description: Synopsix is ​​a game whose the goal is to find the title of a movie from its synopsis.
synopsix.features: Display words according to their proximity score;Visualization of clues;Ranking of the best players;Choice of game mode and movie category

guitarpick.title: GuitarPick
guitarpick.description: GuitarPick is a guitar rental site, developed on the Airbnb model.
guitarpick.features: User session management;Geolocation;Search for products by keywords;User dashboard;Hosting images in the cloud

waw.title: Wall Art Works
waw.description: Wall Art Works is a merchant site specializing in the sale of paintings generated by artificial intelligence.
waw.features: OmniAuth Google & Facebook;Search for products by keywords;Virtual preview environment;Shopping cart management, payment via Stripe
